betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oStart Making this ASAP!

This way for Cursed Sapphire and some Meteoric Befaller!

§fI knew there was a point to spending more time studying Will and Life Essence. I was not satiated with the fairly basicgadgets I produced so far. This is the fields that emerge around living beings, after all, there must be something else.
And indeed, there is something else.
If the isolated materials that exude these fields are combined in truly massive amounts, they form an alloy that is capable of redirecting the Will of those around it, and use it as a weapon. This is how you get the powerful Thorns enchantments the bees were mentioning!
